verses.plain: Elihu also proceeded, and said,

tokens.t: Elihu also proceeded, and said,

verses.plain: Suffer me a little, and I will shew thee that I have yet to speak on God’s behalf.

tokens.t: Suffer me a little, and I will shew thee that
yet to speak on God’s behalf.

verses.plain: I will fetch my knowledge from afar, and will ascribe righteousness to my Maker.

tokens.t: I will fetch my knowledge from afar, and will ascribe righteousness to my Maker.

verses.plain: For truly my words shall not be false: he that is perfect in knowledge is with thee.

tokens.t: For truly my words
not
false: he that is perfect in knowledge
with thee.

verses.plain: Behold, God is mighty, and despiseth not any: he is mighty in strength and wisdom.

tokens.t: Behold, God
mighty, and despiseth not
mighty in strength
wisdom.

verses.plain: He preserveth not the life of the wicked: but giveth right to the poor.

tokens.t: He preserveth not the life of the wicked: but giveth right to the poor.

verses.plain: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous: but with kings are they on the throne; yea, he doth establish them for ever, and they are exalted.

tokens.t: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous: but with kings
on the throne; yea, he doth establish them for ever, and they are exalted.

verses.plain: And if they be bound in fetters, and be holden in cords of affliction;

tokens.t: And if
bound in fetters,
be holden in cords of affliction;

verses.plain: Then he sheweth them their work, and their transgressions that they have exceeded.

tokens.t: Then he sheweth them their work, and their transgressions that they have exceeded.

verses.plain: He openeth also their ear to discipline, and commandeth that they return from iniquity.

tokens.t: He openeth also their ear to discipline, and commandeth that they return from iniquity.

verses.plain: If they obey and serve him, they shall spend their days in prosperity, and their years in pleasures.

tokens.t: If they obey and serve
, they shall spend their days in prosperity, and their years in pleasures.

verses.plain: But if they obey not, they shall perish by the sword, and they shall die without knowledge.

tokens.t: But if they obey not, they shall perish by the sword, and they shall die without knowledge.

verses.plain: But the hypocrites in heart heap up wrath: they cry not when he bindeth them.

tokens.t: But the hypocrites in heart heap up wrath: they cry not when he bindeth them.

verses.plain: They die in youth, and their life is among the unclean.

tokens.t: They die in youth, and their life
among the unclean.

verses.plain: He delivereth the poor in his affliction, and openeth their ears in oppression.

tokens.t: He delivereth the poor in his affliction, and openeth their ears in oppression.

verses.plain: Even so would he have removed thee out of the strait into a broad place, where there is no straitness; and that which should be set on thy table should be full of fatness.

tokens.t: Even so would he have removed thee out of the strait
a broad place, where
no straitness; and that which should be set on thy table
full of fatness.

verses.plain: But thou hast fulfilled the judgment of the wicked: judgment and justice take hold on thee.

tokens.t: But thou hast fulfilled the judgment of the wicked: judgment and justice take hold

verses.plain: Because there is wrath, beware lest he take thee away with his stroke: then a great ransom cannot deliver thee.

tokens.t: Because
wrath,
lest he take thee away with
stroke: then a great ransom cannot deliver thee.

verses.plain: Will he esteem thy riches? no, not gold, nor all the forces of strength.

tokens.t: Will he esteem thy riches?
, not gold, nor all the forces of strength.

verses.plain: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.

tokens.t: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.

verses.plain: Take heed, regard not iniquity: for this hast thou chosen rather than affliction.

tokens.t: Take heed, regard not iniquity: for this hast thou chosen rather than affliction.

verses.plain: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?

tokens.t: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?

verses.plain: Who hath enjoined him his way? or who can say, Thou hast wrought iniquity?

tokens.t: Who hath enjoined him his way? or who can say, Thou hast wrought iniquity?

verses.plain: Remember that thou magnify his work, which men behold.

tokens.t: Remember that thou magnify his work, which men behold.

verses.plain: Every man may see it; man may behold it afar off.

tokens.t: Every man may see it; man may behold
afar off.

verses.plain: Behold, God is great, and we know him not, neither can the number of his years be searched out.

tokens.t: Behold, God
great, and we know
not, neither can the number of his years be searched out.

verses.plain: For he maketh small the drops of water: they pour down rain according to the vapour thereof:

tokens.t: For he maketh small the drops of water: they pour down rain according to the vapour thereof:

verses.plain: Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.

tokens.t: Which the clouds do drop
distil upon man abundantly.

verses.plain: Also can any understand the spreadings of the clouds, or the noise of his tabernacle?

tokens.t: Also can
understand the spreadings of the clouds,
the noise of his tabernacle?

verses.plain: Behold, he spreadeth his light upon it, and covereth the bottom of the sea.

tokens.t: Behold, he spreadeth his light upon it, and covereth the bottom of the sea.

verses.plain: For by them judgeth he the people; he giveth meat in abundance.

tokens.t: For by them judgeth he the people; he giveth meat in abundance.

verses.plain: With clouds he covereth the light; and commandeth it not to shine by the cloud that cometh betwixt.

tokens.t: With clouds he covereth the light; and commandeth it
by
that cometh betwixt.

verses.plain: The noise thereof sheweth concerning it, the cattle also concerning the vapour.

tokens.t: The noise thereof sheweth concerning it, the cattle also concerning the vapour.

footnotes.text: I have…: Heb. there are yet words for God
that…: Heb. the rest of thy table
the vapour: Heb. that which goeth up
